name: Jack the Ripper VS Robin Hood
name_original: Jack the Ripper VS Robin Hood
description:
JACK THE RIPPER VS. ROBIN HOOD! ACTION!

Take control of Jack the Ripper or Robin Hood and step forth into the most action-filled adventure ever to grace your computer screen!

EXCITEMENT!

Travel through time and see things through the perspective of both hero and villain! Added bonus - take control of a Victorian shoe shine boy and actually live his life - through the magnificent power of words!

HORROR!

Actually physically feel the full impact of your action, be they evil or noble. Using state-of-the-art descriptive text, Jack the Ripper VS Robin Hood is the closest you will ever come to walking in the shoes of a serial killer. Virtual reality - at it's most virtualistic
